story_01_02000/2401_1001_0100_10:
I...I can’t believe we lost to you bozos!
Argh! You’ll pay for this!
story_01_02000/2401_1001_0200_10:
Nice timing, you guys!
Cynthia and I were having a nice chat
before those two started harassing us...
story_01_02000/2401_1001_0300_10:
So that’s what was going on...
All in all, I’m glad nothing bad happened.
story_01_02000/2401_1001_0400_10:
Oh, I should introduce you two.
[Name:PlayerNickname ], this is Rosa.
She’s a famous Trainer from the Unova region.
story_01_02000/2401_1001_0500_10:
Hiya! Rosa here!
Nice to meet you, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
story_01_02000/2401_1001_0600_10:
We were looking for you because we wanted
to talk to you, but...
story_01_02000/2401_1001_0700_10:
Imagine our surprise when we saw you 
with the Sinnoh Champion.
Who would have thought you’d be here, too!
story_01_02000/2401_1001_0800_10:
Ahh, so you’ve heard of me, then. 
You’re correct—I’m Cynthia. Lovely to meet 
you all. I’m flattered you think so highly of me.
story_01_02000/2401_1001_0900_10:
Thanks for helping us back there.
I really appreciate it.
story_01_02000/2401_1001_1000_10:
You especially, [Name:PlayerNickname ]...
That was a magnificent battle.
I sense a great deal of potential in you!
story_01_02000/2401_1001_1100_10:
If there are other Trainers like you here
competing in the PML, I’m even more
excited for things to get started.
story_01_02000/2401_1001_1200_10:
Next time we cross paths with one another,
we should have a Pokémon battle.
story_01_02000/2401_1001_1500_10:
Look at you, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
You actually managed to impress THE Cynthia!
story_01_02000/2401_1001_1600_10:
But she was right to be impressed. You were
great in battle, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
story_01_02000/2401_1001_1700_10:
Right, we had something we wanted to talk
to you about, Rosa.
story_01_02000/2401_1001_1800_10:
We’re looking for people to join our team 
for the PML. What do you think?
story_01_02000/2401_1001_1900_10:
Ahh... So that’s why you came to find me.
I’m so flattered!
story_01_02000/2401_1001_2000_10:
But first things first.
We’ve gotta have a Pokémon battle!
story_01_02000/2401_1001_2100_10:
A battle should teach me all I need to know
about you, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
Show me what you’ve got!
